wikipedia.title: Grandmaster Caz
wikipedia.extract: Curtis Brown better known by his stage name Casanova Fly a.k.a Grandmaster Caz, is an American rapper, songwriter and DJ.  He currently works as a celebrity tour guide for Hush Hip Hop Tours, a hip-hop cultural sightseeing tour company in New York City, and is a Board member of The Kennedy Center's Hip-Hop Council,  Hip-Hop Ambassador and Board member for Windows of HipHop and CEO of GMC ENTERTAINMENT INC.
